name: A Giant Cookie Maker Baking Game!
name_original: A Giant Cookie Maker Baking Game!
description:
Making Giant Cookies from scratch has never been so much fun!

Pick a recipe with the flip of a finger... then,

-Add the ingredients,
-Mix them with your Hand Mixer.
-Roll out the dough.
-Cut out the cookies.
-Bake them.
-Decorate with frostings, icings, candies, sprinkles and nuts...

Then eat your own delicious Giant Cookies in the most realistic cookie baking app in the iTunes store.

Or pick a Drop Cookie recipe for more yummy fun.

You can decorate and eat your Giant Cookies in any order... and see your decorated Giant Cookies on the cookie sheet.

There is a huge variety of cookie cutters, including Holiday ones, something for everyone!

Fun for Kids and the Kid in You!
